alternative_parents.description: Vinyl halides in which a chlorine atom is bonded to an sp2-hybridised carbon atom.
alternative_parents.name: Vinyl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a metalloid atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic metalloid salts

alternative_parents.description: Compounds derived from an alkene by replacing a hydrogen atom with a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Chloroalkenes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: AsH3 and compounds derived from it by substituting one, two or three hydrogen atoms by hydrocarbyl groups: R3As, RAsH2, R2AsH, R3As (R is not H) are called primary, secondary and tertiary arsines, respectively.
alternative_parents.name: Arsines

class.description: Organic compounds containing a metalloid atom.
class.name: Organometalloid compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as tertiary arsines. These are organoarsenic compounds with a trisubstituted arsenic atom. They have the general formula R[As](R')R\", R,R',R\"=organyl group.

direct_parent.description: Organoarsenic compounds with a trisubstituted arsenic atom. They have the general formula R[As](R')R\", R,R',R\"=organyl group.
direct_parent.name: Tertiary arsines

intermediate_nodes.description: Organoarsenic compounds in which a carbon is linked to a trivalent arsenic atom.
intermediate_nodes.name: Trivalent organic arsenic compounds

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing bond between a carbon atom and an arsenic atom.
subclass.name: Organoarsenic compounds

superclass.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and metal atom.
superclass.name: Organometallic compounds
